metadata.dc:author: Regueiro López, J C
Requena Tapia, M J
Anglada Curado, F J
Moreno Arcas, P
Prieto Castro, R
Blanco Espinosa, A
Leva Vallejo, M
metadata.dc:description: We report on a case of fully gas-filled bladder with no evidence of intramural gas, fistula between bladder and gastrointestinal tract or instrumentation. The patient is diagnosed of a diabetic neurogenic bladder. We comment the causes of this rare finding and its relation with emphysematous cystitis.
metadata.dc:title: Pneumocistos, una rara complicación infecciosa en diabéticos.
[Pneumocysts, unusual infective complication in diabetics].
